title: Adult Coloring Books Keyword Research - Low competition and High Search Results
description:
#kdp #selfpublishing #nicheresearch #nicheideas #coloringbook #adultcoloring #keywords 

Here I've got 50 + great niches for adult coloring books. I'm comparing each one for competitiveness and search volume. All of them are great niches that you can use and I've got a free gift for you. See link below

Free summary of data spreadsheet: All I ask in return is that you like this video and subscribe to my channel if you haven't already - It's completely free to do this also. Thanks :)
https://kdpatoz.gumroad.com/l/lntns

Why not try combining the keywords to make your coloring books even more unique with lower competition, you can use more than one at a time.

If you haven't seen it already, I have a video here which shows you how create your own coloring books that you can publish on Amazon KDP
https://youtu.be/x2u3eNl4QaU

Check out my other videos where I show you step by step how to do everything you need on Amazon KDP
